website_summaries.verdict: This large vape travel case offers lots of storage space and other terrific features.
pros: Includes 3 convenient pockets that are big enough to hold a wide range of vape accessories
Constructed from molded EVA that ensures long-lasting strength and durability
Case is semi-waterproof for added versatility
Equipped with scratch-resistant lining for extra protection
cons: Zipper sometimes breaks, even after limited use
May be too big to fit into a purse or backpack

customer_reviews.title: Great for E-cig rigs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son who has switched from regular to e-cigarettes. He likes that it can carry all of his gear and concentrates and clips to his belt loop. Zips securely. Only reason I did not give this 5 stars is the direction of the pockets are different on either side, so you have to open it flat or some things will fall out. At first I thought it was defective but it matches the seller's photo.
customer_reviews.author: KfromTX

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is good for my vape pens and cartridges. I am using the case daily and I can open it up without anything falling out, since I have put my vape pen with the cartridge on the side with the elastic and mess pocket so that my pens through the elastic hold and the mesh is on the top part holding my cartridge mouth piece in place, while the pockets on the other side hold my charger and cover for my cartridge. It protects my items like I wanted and it is a pretty color purple.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great for Electronic Cigs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for wifey after she finally quit smoking by moving to VUSE electronic cigs. She loves this case and I love the fact the quit real cigarettes. It holds her VUSE cig stem along with extra cartridges. It's larger than the pictures might indicate so there's also room for a small USB charger and short USB cable along with some other stuff. Charger comes in handy for her phone as well.
customer_reviews.author: lvron

customer_reviews.title: This is nice for on the go but it is rather bulky
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for on the go but it is rather bulky. It does not fit easily into my purse. Also- the pockets on the inside are odd. If I put my liquids and vapes on opposite sides they are both upside down... when I open it either my vape or liquid could fall out. The price is right but the design is faulted.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but inside pockets are useless
customer_reviews.text: The inside elastic mesh pockets are basically useless, they do not hold things in them. Also the little straps sewn in to put your battery/cartridges in, don't hold them well either. It's an OK case otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice little case, convenient pockets.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first case I've purchased for my vape accoutrements and I'm very happy with it. The pockets are all perfect for organizing coils, eliquids, pens, mods, chargers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dani A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design. Smooth case, with wonderful double zippers that move very freely. Product fits perfectly. Aces.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nickle

customer_reviews.title: This was great, held two juices cord and a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: This was great, held two juices cord and a couple of the tools to build coils. Today one of the slippers broke, I was highly upset because I love this case. It was not over packed or anything, just simply went to close it and, pop, zipper broken. Thankfully one sipper still works, I will continue to use this until I find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina freundt

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: this can hold a lot of vape stuff ejices coils you mod stick or a regular mod fits in it perfect too
customer_reviews.author: mitchell legon

customer_reviews.title: Nice carry case for vap pens and accessories
customer_reviews.text: Really nice kit for my vap pens and USB chargers. Plenty of room and well constructed. My favorite color purple. Do wish it was larger with all my accessories I have.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa Strudwick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, sturdy, pretty color. Perfect for organizing all my vape equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arellano

customer_reviews.title: It could definitely be a little roomier. There's no ...
customer_reviews.text: It could definitely be a little roomier. There's no way my charger, spare coils, vape juice and vape "pen" are all fitting in here and closing properly.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: The perfect carrying and storage case
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and the slim design takes up less space while protecting your valuable contents
customer_reviews.author: RealPolitics.LA

customer_reviews.title: I vape and keep my mode with me everywhere I ...
customer_reviews.text: I vape and keep my mode with me everywhere I go, this has made it so much easier to keep my items together.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Love that I can hook it to my jeans.
customer_reviews.author: LeahMae Wells

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not big enough to hold all your vape accessories
customer_reviews.text: It's a great item, not much room. You can't double items in there, so if you want to put you juice in there, with the vape and extra coils, one side is completely un-usable if you use just 3 things in it. Look at the inside pictures and you will see you can only load one side. It's only a inch wide, and its a hard case so there is no packing it full with a bunch of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gifted Guy

customer_reviews.title: Cool Case
customer_reviews.text: Like the case. Holds everything I need and fits in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Has many pockets and fits comfortably in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Latesha Johnson
